page.title: 11METHODIST CHAPEL.
page.content: Founded in 1878 by Mr.Milne,it has since been replastered and the centre window,behind the altar,blocked up. These alterations were completed in 1984.The building has no prominent features.The Rev.David Wheeler has been Minister for two years and will normally stay five years.He usually comes to give a Sacrament Service on Sundays.As he ministers to several parishes,we have a Lay Preacher when he isn't available.The Service is from 11.00 to 12.00 noon.Evening Services are only held on special occasions. There are twelve families which attend regularly.Nine or ten children go to Sunday school where they talk about The Bible and the Life of Jesus.Chapel activities comprise coffee-mornings, youth-club,ladies-circle & friendship luncheons.Special Services include the Harvest Festival & Anniversaries.
